name: Racoon Ops
description:
Help our racoon sneak around the house to fulfill his next big heist

Why would a racoon be potting so much theft? Well to built  his DIY teleporter to heaven!

Help him by moving him around the house with WASD and sneak with Shift, and of course don't forget to avoid all cats and dogs! After gathering the required item return to your treehouse.

Meet the suporters of racoon heists:
